#summary Returning a more complex object from Translate API calls.

= Introduction =

It looks increasingly likely that the API will have to return a custom object as the translation result. This will lose the simplicity of returning a String[] but provided added functionality as detailed below.

= Reasons for =

  * Issue 75 - Returning the detected language as part of using AUTO_DETECT
  * Issue 76 - Translating multiple Strings from a single Language to multiple Languages
